instructions.title: How To Delete Your Grindr Account
instructions.before: Deleting the Grindr App will not delete your account.  You need to navigate through the app on your mobile device in order to delete your account.
instructions.after: Remember, you will need to cancel your recurring subscription when deleting your account; otherwise you will keep paying for your profile even though it has been deleted.
thingsToRemember: The deletion process removes the following information: Grindr account email address, profile Information (like your headline, about, etc.), profile photo, favorites, blocks, and chats
After Deletion, your account will be completely removed and you can not recover any information which was stored on your account
If you want to remove your chat logs you will need to to block the person before you delete your account
Unfortunately, a profile is unable to be recovered after deletion as this is a permanent action. However, you can create a new profile using the the same email address
If you revoke your consent for the processing of Personal Data, then Grindr will no longer be able to provide the Grindr Services

steps: Tap the Setting Gear on the Top Right
Scroll Down and Tap Delete Profile
Once you see this screen you know your profile has been deleted
To finish deletion hold down the Grindr App and then Tap the X to delete the App
